site.name: Mine Performance Academy
site.tagline: Elite training for the next level.
site.description: Mine Performance Academy delivers expert coaching in velocity, pitch design, hitting, strength, and rehab for youth and amateur athletes.

programs.name: Velocity Development
programs.shortDescription: Data-driven throwing velocity programs for pitchers.
programs.description: Structured programs to safely increase arm speed and command with progress tracking.

programs.name: Pitch Design
programs.shortDescription: Shape and refine your arsenal with TrackMan and Edgertronic.
programs.description: Work with coaches to design and optimize pitch movement and sequencing.

programs.name: Hitting
programs.shortDescription: Swing mechanics, approach, and bat path optimization.
programs.description: Individual and group hitting instruction with video and data feedback.

programs.name: Strength & Conditioning
programs.description: Age-appropriate strength and conditioning to support performance and reduce injury risk.

programs.name: Rehab & Recovery
programs.description: Structured rehab protocols and recovery support with qualified staff.

testimonials.quote: My son gained 4 mph in one offseason. The environment and coaching are top-notch.
testimonials.author: Parent, travel ball

testimonials.quote: Clear progress, great communication, and a facility we trust.
testimonials.author: Parent

faqs.question: What should we bring to the first session?
faqs.answer: Athletic attire, cleats or athletic shoes, and a water bottle. We'll provide any equipment needed for the evaluation.

faqs.question: How do I book an evaluation or lesson?
faqs.answer: Use the Book evaluation or Contact buttons on this site, or reach out by phone or the contact form. We'll get you scheduled.

faqs.question: Do you offer memberships or packages?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer membership and package options for ongoing training. Details are available when you contact us or book an evaluation.

faqs.question: What ages do you work with?
faqs.answer: We work with youth and amateur athletes. Specific age ranges may vary by program; contact us or use Start Here to find the right fit.

faqs.question: Where are you located and what are your hours?
faqs.answer: See our Contact page for address, map, and current hours. We're at 4999 Houston Rd Suite 500-2, Florence, KY 41042.

events.name: Winter Training Program (Ages 7–13)
events.shortDescription: Multi-session winter training for youth athletes.

events.name: Winter Training Program (Ages 15+)
events.shortDescription: Winter training for high school and older athletes.

leaderboardHighlights.description: Our athletes consistently rank on facility and national leaderboards. We track 60yd, C Velo, Exit Velo, and FB Velo.
